metadata.name: Fate
metadata.description:
Those who are destined to meet 
are tied by the red string of fate. 
Regardless of time, 
place, or circumstance. 
The string may stretch or tangle, 
but it will never break

We may be separated
but we are always connected.
Our destinies were entwined
from the beginning

Do you ever wonder who tied to the other end ?

━━━━━━━━━━

4000x4000 px
